thread.title: Initial Apple Music holdout Adele brings her new single ‘Hello’ to the service from today (iTunes too)

author: newsr.in
title: Initial Apple Music holdout Adele brings her new single ‘Hello’ to the service from today (iTunes too)
text: Adele, who initially declined to allow her music onto Apple Music, has brought her new single ‘Hello’ to the streaming music service. The single is also available on iTunes. Adele hasn’t had the easiest of relationships with streaming music services. She refused to allow Spotify to stream 21 until long after its release, and didn’t sign […] »
